description:
A helper over time with the same rights as a helper to prove that they can be a good helper.

After a few days, higher ranked staff members will decide whether this person becomes a normal helper or not.

Applications for trial helpers are sometimes opened in #community-announcements.
name: trialhelper

description: Helpers are users who have passed the trial helper phase. Helpers take care of #feedback, #bugs and #questions. They help keeping the server a clean and safe place.
name: helper

description:
A minimod over time with the same rights as a minimod to prove that they can be a good minimod.

After a few days, higher ranked staff members will decide whether this person becomes a normal minimod or not.
name: trialminimod

description:
Minimods are users who have passed the trial minimod phase. Minimods have the same tasks as helper but can also take care of misbehaving users.

They also handle submissions for #role-vote and #design-vote.
name: minimod

description:
Moderators can ban users from the discord. They manage the staff team and events.

They also take care of most badges and some game-related topics.
name: mod

description: They are the admins of the server. They manage all staff and focus on things such as rules, bans from the server, and other related topics. Manager is the highest rank for Discord staff and also the hardest one to get.
name: megamod

description:
Guardians take care of ingame reports and bans. They also handle GuardianChat tickets.

All guardians are over 18, speak english and never had any ingame ban.

Guardians are picked by the guardian manager and guardian manager helper.
name: guardian

description:
The guardian manager helpers handle guardian-related reports.

They help the guardian manager manage the guardian team.
name: guardianmanagerhelper

description:
The guardian managers handle guardian-related reports.

They manage the team and decide if it is necessary to open guardian applications.
name: guardianmanager

description:
Mentors answer game-related questions via mentor chat. This is via another platform than discord.

All mentors are over 18 and speak english.

Mentors are picked by the mentor manager and mentor manager helper
name: mentor

description:
The mentor manager helpers handle mentor-related reports.

They help the mentor manager manage the mentor team.
name: mentormanagerhelper

description:
The mentor managers handle the mentor team and take care of more aspects of it.

They manage the team and decide if it is necessary to open mentor applications.
name: mentormanager

description: The social media manager team who takes care of the official subreddit.
display_name: Social media manager
name: reddit

description: The social media manager team who takes care of the official instagram account.
display_name: Social media manager
name: instagram

description: The social media manager team who takes care of the official facebook account.
display_name: Social media manager
name: facebook

description: The social media manager team who takes care of the official twitter account.
display_name: Social media manager
name: twitter

description: Each social media manager handles one or more of the official account/platform on twitter, reddit, instagram or facebook
name: socialmedia

description:
The game!

They are ones behind all new features and evil bugs, if they're not busy looking for squids.
name: dev

description: They handle tests of weird and funky scenarios in the Tester Club sideserver and the server in itself.
name: tc_mod

description: They take care of the Tester Club sideserver with almost all permissions.
name: tc_admin

description: They no longer are a staff member.
display_name: This user no longer has any staff role.
name: resigned

description:
The game!

They are ones behind all new features and evil bugs, if they're not busy looking for squids.
name: minidev
